text: Ratko Janev () (March 30, 1939 – December 31, 2019) was a Macedonian atomic physicist. He was a member of the Macedonian Academy of Sciences and Arts.Preminuo fizičar Ratko Janev; 09. Jan. 2020, PTC; (Biography in Serbian.). ==Life== Janev was born in Sveti Vrač, Bulgaria. From 1986, he was in charge of the Atomic and Molecular Unit of the International Atomic Energy Agency in Vienna. In 1972, Janev became Adjunct professor of nuclear physics at the University of Skopje and Professor of Theoretical Physics at the University of Belgrade. Janev died on December 31, 2019 in Belgrade at the age of 80.Почина академик Ратко Јанев ==Books== * * * * ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Europe ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Physicists Category:Macedonians from Bulgaria Category:Serbian scientists
title: Ratko Janev
